target.name: downloadEnsembl
target.description: Downloads files for Ensembl to staging area.

target.name: assembleEnsembl
target.description: Assembles files for Ensembl into fasta files in the staging area.

target.name: convertEnsembl
target.description: Converts FASTA files for Ensembl into blastable files in the staging area.

target.name: pushEnsembl
target.description: Pushes blast files for Ensembl to production from the staging area.

target.name: revertEnsembl
target.description: Pulls archived blast files from production to the staging area.
